name: Remedy: Avoid Workflows With Queries using JOINS  on more than 4 Tables
description: Queries with joins based on a large number of tables can cause performance problems.
output: This report lists all Workflows with SQL statement using JOINS on more than 4 tables. It provides the following information: Workflow full name
rationale: Having complex queries in artifacts can cause performance problems. Queries using JOINS on more than 4 tables is considered complex and not efficient.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
